tha-ap532:9.3: Āsahaṃ dhanadhaññassa → āsabhaṃ dhanadhaññassa (sya1ed, sya2ed) | anantadhanadhaññassa (mr)
tha-ap532:11.3: Haṃsarutehi nigghosaṃ → haṃsarudābhinigghosaṃ (bj) | haṃsadundubhinigghosaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap532:24.4: hantā ātāpī tāpaso → tāpitā ca visositā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | hantā tātāpi tāpaso (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap532:30.4: sabbagandhova hoti me → sabbagandhotiseti me (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap532:32.2: Phalaṃ tu → phalantaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | phalan tu (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap532:33.2: hitāya ca na sadisaṃ → hitāya janasandhisu (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | hitāyanaṃ sukhāvahaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap532:33.4: saṃgho vīrasamāyuto → saraddhanisamāyuto (bj) | saṅgho vīrasamāsuto (sya1ed, sya2ed) | rasaddhovisamāyuto (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap532:35.1: Khīṇe āyusi → khīṇe pāsusi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | khīṇevāyupi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap532:39.1: titthikākiṇṇe → janoghe titthakākiṇṇe (bj) | jino yo titthikātiṇṇo (sya1ed, sya2ed) | janoghe titthikākiṇṇo (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap532:42.4: paribhūto na tenahaṃ → paribhūtena tenahaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
